text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock It was a goal set not a promise ! Why not set a target for incentive and try and fill that goal . ffs, if they didn't reach it I but I bet they had a good go trying. How about you media stop the bollox and try helping rather than ridiculing ?
